channel.title: I'm having trouble running .bat files
channel.description: alright well whenever i click on a .bat file, it opens up the small black screen, then it quickly flashes a paragraph of text, after that it says "please press any key to continue", so i do that. and it doesn't open anything but closes the black window. oO

item.title: I'm having trouble running .bat files
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

Ckstunnerscape:

That’s called the command promt genius, Apparently the idiot who made it did it wrong, And when it says press any key to continue, It’s because of the coding, And always right click edit, and look at the code in the .bat files, Because they can delete files, If you see anything like del and System32, Don’t run it, Because it will delete your System32, Which is the most important OS files, And, Also, Right click edit on that .bay file and copy the code in it and post it here just to make sure

whats a .bay?

[quote]
edit on that .bay file

Read full topic
